Gremlin:GremlinBomb.NAME: Gremlin Bomb
Gremlin:GremlinBomb.FLAVOR: Gremlins have an uncanny knack for finding dangerous things. Sometimes, they even survive looting them.

Gremlin:GremlinKnob.NAME: Gremlin Knob
Gremlin:GremlinKnob.FLAVOR: A sign of status among the Gremlin Mobs.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy dies, gain [E] , draw #b1 card, and #ySwap to the next Gremlin.

Gremlin:GremlinMask.NAME: Gremlin Mask
Gremlin:GremlinMask.FLAVOR: A sign of status among the Gremlin Mobs.

Gremlin:PricklyShields.NAME: PricklyShields
Gremlin:PricklyShields.FLAVOR: Gremlins use whatever scraps they can find as weapons or armor. Some serve as both.

Gremlin:StolenMerchandise.NAME: Stolen Merchandise
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you #ySwap, add an #yEcho of a random Colorless card to your hand.

Gremlin:SupplyScroll.NAME: Supply Scroll
Gremlin:SupplyScroll.FLAVOR: A surprisingly detailed inventory of the mob's various bits and bobbles.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your 3rd turn, add a random assortment of 4 #yShivs and #yWards to your hand.

Gremlin:WizardStaff.NAME: Wizard Staff
Gremlin:WizardStaff.FLAVOR: The pride and joy of every Gremlin Wizard, this staff is a frequent target of theft by rival mobs.
